DOC.detailed_description: A Single-Center , Open-Label , Randomized,3-Treatment,3-Period Cross-Over Study Investigate Potential Effect Cyclosporine Pharmacokinetics , Safety , Tolerability Ticagrelor Effect Ticagrelor Pharmacokinetics , Safety , Tolerability Cyclosporine .
DOC.criteria: Provision sign date write informed consent prior studyspecific procedure Healthy male subject age 18 45 year ( inclusive ) suitable vein cannulation repeat venipuncture History presence gastrointestinal , hepatic renal disease , condition know interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion drug A history hemophilia , von Willebrand 's disease , lupus anticoagulant , diseases/syndromes either alter increase propensity bleed A personal history vascular abnormality include aneurysm ; personal history severe hemorrhage , hematemesis , melena , hemoptysis , severe epistaxis , severe thrombocytopenia , intracranial hemorrhage , rectal bleeding within 1 year
